#text=I recently started biking to lose weight and for health .
#text=After a month of biking everyday , my bike hit a nail in the road which I think is pretty dangerous .
#text=Because of the expenses with school , I would not be able to afford a new tire .
#text=So I thought to myself , maybe I can fix it .
#text=I resolved to fix it this Sunday , because I figured Friday and Saturday would be too busy .
#text=I 've never repaired a bike tire before .
#text=So I searched google for some tutorials .
#text=Turns out , I can just use a sticky material to cover the part that 's broken .
#text=Then it occurred to me that maybe an automotive store would have it , and they did !
#text=Stuck it in and inflated my tire .
#text=It 's been working for months ever since !
